pl.bristleback.server.bristle.api.users

Interface UserDetailsService


  • public interface UserDetailsService
    Components implementing this interface resolve UserDetails objects from any source chosen by the implementation. User details services should not validate retrieved user details as this task is later done by authentication actions (actions annotated with Authenticator) and AuthenticationInterceptor.

    Created on: 19.02.13 22:44

    Author:
    Wojciech Niemiec

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      UserDetails getUserDetails(String username)
      Retrieves UserDetails implementation for user with given username.

    • Method Detail

      • getUserDetails

        UserDetails getUserDetails(String username)
        Retrieves UserDetails implementation for user with given username. If there is no user with given username, service can return null or throw any exception, like IncorrectUsernameOrPasswordException.
        Parameters:
        username - name of the user to retrieve.
        Returns:
        UserDetails implementation or null if there is no user with given username.
